channel.title: Adventures suitable for Earthdawn
channel.description: Since people are in the mood to talk about adventures, I’m looking for *Dungeon World*, OSR, or other adventures that are a particularly good fit for use in the setting of *Earthdawn*. Not just “well, you could probably run X there”, but “oh! this part of X matches really well with this particular aspect of the Earthdawn setting” stuff.

item.title: Adventures suitable for Earthdawn
item.dc:creator: @wordman
item.description:
